column4: gee thanks makes me feel warm and fuzzy on the inside
id at least appreciate the aknowledgement of "no, nobody know about wol here" so i dont waste my time waiting for an answer

i have a computer that stays on all the time and i computer i need to turn on with it via wake on lan, i tried a few tutorials to no avail, is anyone skilled in wol so they could maybe help me troubleshoot my issue?
I gave up on WOL on Linux. :/
That's all you want? For your PC to turn on every morning?
yes, thats ALL AND MY LIFE WIL BE FULFILLED
ive been looking for a week now
